resources.string: Choose a Disease to learn more!
Eight-year-old Fode Dramé, who has trachoma and will receive treatment from a community volunteer to protect him for the rest of the year.

Trachoma Starts off as a highly contagious bacterial infection which can be easily treated. If not, over time it makes your eyelashes turn inward so with every blink they’re scraping your eyeball. It is unbearably painful and eventually causes blindness.
